recipes.name: Burnished Leather
recipes.description:
Produces 8, plus additional based on Leatherworking skill. 

May also yield Sorcerous Earth and/or Sorcerous Water.

Cooldown resets daily.

recipes.name: Burnished Leather
recipes.description:
Produces 10. May also yield Sorcerous Earth and/or Sorcerous Water.

Can be performed up to three times in a row, but it takes 24 hours to recover 1 use.

recipes.name: Exotic Leather
recipes.description: Cleanse five pieces of sha-touched leather to create one exotic leather.

recipes.name: Hardened Magnificent Hide
recipes.description: Create a Hardened Magnificent Hide from two Magnificent Hides once a day. In the process, your knowledge of Pandaren Leatherworking may increase, resulting in the discovery of a new pattern.

recipes.name: Primal Leg Reinforcements
recipes.description:
Permanently attach primal leg reinforcements onto your pants, increasing Agility by 5 and critical strike by 3.

Primal leg reinforcements cause the item to become soulbound.

recipes.name: Draconic Leg Reinforcements
recipes.description:
Permanently attach draconic leg reinforcements onto your pants, increasing Strength by 5 and critical strike by 3.

Draconic leg reinforcements cause the item to become soulbound.

recipes.name: Heavy Leg Reinforcements
recipes.description:
Permanently attach heavy leg reinforcements onto your pants, increasing Stamina by 8 and dodge by 3.

Heavy leg reinforcements cause the item to become soulbound.

recipes.name: Magnificence of Leather
recipes.description: Create a Magnificent Hide from Exotic Leather once a day. In the process, your knowledge of Pandaren Leatherworking may increase, resulting in the discovery of a new pattern. Shares cooldown with the Magnificence of Scales.

recipes.name: Magnificence of Scales
recipes.description: Create a Magnificent Hide from Prismatic Scales once a day. In the process, your knowledge of Pandaren Leatherworking may increase, resulting in the discovery of a new pattern. Shares cooldown with the Magnificence of Leather.
